meanings.definition: A person who swims the backstroke.
meanings.sent1: The pool was filled with skilled backstrokers gliding effortlessly through the water.
meanings.sent2: The backstrokers at the swim meet all wore goggles to protect their eyes.
meanings.sent3: The backstrokers at the pool party were the first to spot the surprise guest.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, we are all backstrokers navigating the currents of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the backstrokers for their graceful technique in the water.
